title: BRIEF-GWR Group Signs Wiluna West Gold Project JV Agreement With Blackham Resources
text:
BRIEF-GWR Group Signs Wiluna West Gold Project JV Agreement With Blackham Resources

Commodities 33 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 20:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-GWR Group Signs Wiluna West Gold Project JV Agreement With Blackham Resources Oct 14 (Reuters) - GWR Group Ltd : * SIGNED WILUNA WEST GOLD PROJECT MINING AND MILLING JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT WITH BLACKHAM RESOURCES * AGREEMENT TO MINE WILUNA WEST GOLD PROJECT * UNDER JVA, GWR IS RESPONSIBLE FOR DRILLING GOLD DEPOSITS TO JORC 2012 INDICATED CATEGORY & BLACKHAM WILL CONDUCT FEASIBILITY STUDIES * JV INTERESTS ARE 65% FOR BLK, 35% FOR CO ON MINING, PROCESSING COSTS, ON GOLD PRODUCED

BRIEF-GWR Group Signs Wiluna West Gold Project JV Agreement With Blackham Resources
description: BRIEF-GWR Group Signs Wiluna West Gold Project JV Agreement With Blackham Resources
